summary: Visibility is power. To avoid being overshadowed, craft spectacles that imprint your presence in others' minds. Outshine superiors subtly but relentlessly—flamboyance risks backlash without substance. Use mystery, contrast, and grand gestures to command focus. Balance uniqueness with strategic restraint to sustain intrigue. Those who fade into the crowd surrender control to bolder forces.

slides.section_title: Visibility is survival in the court of power
slides.section_body: What goes unseen holds no influence. Strategically amplify your presence through calculated spectacle. Make observers feel they're witnessing something extraordinary. Subtlety kills ambition here.

slides.section_title: Outshine your masters, never your superiors
slides.section_body: Make mentors glow brighter in your reflected light. When surpassing rulers, cloak triumphs as collective victories. The sun tolerates stars—but obliterates rival suns.
slides.quote: “Never appear too perfect—only appear more perfect than required.”
“Reveal strengths like timed fireworks—each burst designed to awe.”

slides.section_title: Turn rivals into foils for your radiance
slides.section_body: Position adversaries as shadows to your light. Their ordinariness becomes your amplifier. Let their predictability highlight your dynamism.
slides.quote: “A candle gains brilliance when surrounded by darkness.”

slides.section_body: Break patterns violently enough to rewrite observers' reality. A calculated outrageous act etches deeper than years of conformity.
Design recurring motifs that become synonymous with your presence. A signature color, gesture, or phrase that triggers instant recognition.
slides.quote: “Repetition with variation is the music of remembrance.”

slides.section_title: Let silence amplify your grand entrances
slides.section_body: Withdraw strategically to make returns momentous. Absence primes the stage; reappearance becomes an event.
slides.quote: “The curtain rises loudest after prolonged darkness.”

slides.section_body: Transform resentment at your prominence into addictive intrigue. Make critics crave your next move despite themselves.
Curate visuals that bypass rational resistance. A perfectly timed sartorial statement disarms more effectively than arguments.
slides.quote: “The eye conquers before the mind consents.”

slides.section_title: Let obscurity be your only true enemy
slides.section_body: Better to be debated in chambers than forgotten in streets. All corrections can be made except irrelevance.
slides.quote: “To live unobserved is to wield power unseen—which is no power at all.”
